item.title: Why doesnt this work, cant understand it >.<
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

The Un-Named:

SRL 4.0 doesn’t have x, y as global variables due to internal mayhem.

Thank God. Should have follow Kait’s advice on global variables/functions/procedures in the first place.

Read full topic
item.source: Why doesnt this work, cant understand it >.<

item.title: Why doesnt this work, cant understand it >.<
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“exps35, post:2, topic:134535”]Under your variables add

var
x,y,attack:Integer

That is, unless you have SRL commands in your script. This one doesn’t use any, but in the future, when you have to setup SRL, the declaring the x and y variable isn’t needed. In fact, it will give you an error.[/quote]

SRL 4.0 doesn’t have x, y as global variables due to internal mayhem.

Read full topic
item.source: Why doesnt this work, cant understand it >.<

item.title: Why doesnt this work, cant understand it >.<
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

Under your variables add

var
x,y,attack:Integer

That is, unless you have SRL commands in your script. This one doesn’t use any, but in the future, when you have to setup SRL, the declaring the x and y variable isn’t needed. In fact, it will give you an error.

Read full topic
item.source: Why doesnt this work, cant understand it >.<

item.title: Why doesnt this work, cant understand it >.<
item.dc:creator: @fook fook
item.description:
@fook wrote:

yes i know theyre detectable commands but thats not what im interested in, i keep getting this error and i dont know why the code seems fine 2 me

ERROR=
Line 20: [Error] (20:11): Unknown identifier ‘x’ in script C:\Documents and Settings\Compaq_Owner\My Documents\chickens.scar
script VVVVV

[code]program chickenkiller;

const
chickencolor = 4018280; //chicken colour

var
attack: integer;

procedure loaddmps;
begin
attack := BitmapFromString(38, 11, ‘z78DA33301805C319B80101’ +
‘2A895F25F1E2B473272DFC884B96127BE9E3474C5DC4F805977A6’ +
‘274111386A48627A9B1432DF3696123F17AE9E347E2E388F81448’ +
‘7CAAA0A71FA91517F8FD486AFA2735B42917A7458C0C867C4AADF’ +
‘C48DD3446B938E5253031E2002E2F0BFF’);
end;

procedure rightclicking;
begin
findcolor(x,y,chickencolor,1,1,1,1);
wait(200+random(50));
clickmouse(x,y,1,1,false);
findbitmap(attack,x,y);
wait(200+random(50));
clickmouse(x,y,1,1,true);
end;

begin
loaddmps;
repeat
rightclicking;
until(false)
end.[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Why doesnt this work, cant understand it >.<
